<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER August 2017 GOOD NEWS FOR RM-850 OPERATORS Honeywell recognizes replacing two RM-850s with new -855s is the most expensive part of the ADS-B Out upgrade and can increase the overall “flyaway” price substantially. We have recently announced a more affordable...
